snippet: GOLDSMITH--Jerene, on March 15, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Alvin. Devoted mother of Bill Goldsmith and Suzy Priest. Cherished grandmother of Leo. Services Sunday 11:30am at "The Riverside," 76th Street at Amsterdam Avenue. 1/3
lead_paragraph: GOLDSMITH--Jerene, on March 15, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Alvin. Devoted mother of Bill Goldsmith and Suzy Priest. Cherished grandmother of Leo. Services Sunday 11:30am at "The Riverside," 76th Street at Amsterdam Avenue. 1/3
